mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectOrdClmGodCnnc Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ORD_NO , ORD_GOD_TURN , CLM_NO , CLM_WRHS_GOD_TURN , GOD_CNNC_TP_CD , ORD_CLM_QTY , ORD_CLM_WTHDRAW_QTY , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM ORD_CLM_GOD_CNNC WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ORD_GOD_TURN = #{ordGodTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND CLM_NO = #{clmNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CLM_WRHS_GOD_TURN = #{clmWrhsGodTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
